ComicInfo.Title: Tempest Fugit, Part 3 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary: Tempest Fugit, Part 3 of 5: Fin Fang Foom challenges the Hulk to a battle as Ross leads the other castaways to a secret compound on the island.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-18 01:24:22. [CVDB101162] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:58:46. [Issue ID 224438]
ComicInfo.Editor: Andy Schmidt,Joe Quesada,Nicole Wiley Boose,Stephanie Moore,Tom Brevoort
ComicInfo.Characters: James Howlett] (cameo),Professor Yarish,Gwen,Wolverine [Logan,Miss Banner [Mrs. Drake] (flashback,General Thunderbolt Ross [Thaddeus Ross],Ripley,Fin Fang Foom,Hulk [Bruce Banner],Bruce's aunt),Carla (flashback)
